page.title: 02A Day in the Life of A Child
page.content: My name is Caroline Perry. I am 9 and I live in Knowle. This is about a Wednesday in my life. I get up at 8.30am and have a cup of tea. Next I get washed, dressed and have breakfast. I have cereal, brown bread and fruit juice. After, I go to school, we have assembly and next we do English spellings. Next it is playtime when I play with my friends. Sometimes I play games or swap stickers. After we have had Mathematics we do addition, subtraction, times tables and division. At 12 noon we have lunch and afterwards I have choir practice. We are singing Daedalus And Icarus at the moment. After choir we have Art and Craft until home time at 3.30pm. When I go home, have my tea and play. Next I watch T.V. until I go to bed at 9.00pm.
